opportunities.name: No opportunities
opportunities.description: Patients with hypertension who have NOT had their renal function measured in the last 12 months and no contact with the practice
opportunities.main: These are patients that you have had no contact with.

opportunities.name: Face-to-face
opportunities.description: Patients with hypertension who have NOT had their renal function measured in the last 12 months who have seen a clinician in the practice
opportunities.main: These are patients you have had direct contact with (e.g. face-to-face or telephone).

opportunities.name: Non face-to-face
opportunities.description: Patients with hypertension who have NOT had their BP measured in the last 12 months who have had some sort of contact e.g. telephone calls, or picking up repeat prescriptions
opportunities.main: These are patients you have had indirect contact with (e.g. prescriptions or letters).

opportunities.name: Frail
opportunities.description: Patients with a frailty code in their record who may benefit from being excluded from hypertension quality standards

opportunities.name: Palliative
opportunities.description: Patients who are receiving palliative care treatment that may benefit from exclusion from hypertension quality standards
